POWER OF ATTORNEY

KNOW ALL MEN BY THESE PRESENTS, that I, Robert Wilson, of the City of New York, County of New York, State of New York, do hereby make, constitute and appoint Michael Thompson, of Albany, New York, as my true and lawful attorney-in-fact.

POWERS GRANTED

I hereby grant to my said attorney-in-fact full power and authority to act in my name, place and stead in any way which I myself could do, if I were personally present, with respect to the following matters:

1. FINANCIAL TRANSACTIONS: To conduct banking transactions, including but not limited to depositing and withdrawing funds from any accounts in my name.

2. REAL ESTATE: To buy, sell, lease, mortgage, or otherwise deal with any real estate that I may own or have an interest in.

3. LEGAL MATTERS: To commence, prosecute, defend, or settle any legal proceedings in which I may be involved.

4. TAX MATTERS: To prepare, sign, and file any tax returns and to represent me before any tax authority.

This Power of Attorney shall be governed by the laws of the State of New York and shall remain in full force and effect until revoked by me in writing.

I hereby ratify and confirm all acts which my said attorney-in-fact may lawfully do or cause to be done by virtue hereof.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, I have hereunto set my hand and seal this 5th day of April, 2024.

STATE OF NEW YORK    )
                     ) ss.
COUNTY OF NEW YORK   )

On this 5th day of April, 2024, before me personally appeared Robert Wilson, who proved to me on the basis of satisfactory evidence to be the person whose name is subscribed to the within instrument.

_________________________
Notary Public, State of New York

Robert Wilson
Principal
